babel-plugin-transform-es2015-sticky-regex

Compile ES2015 sticky regex to an ES5 RegExp constructor

Installation

sh npm install --save-dev babel-plugin-transform-es2015-sticky-regex

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

json { "plugins": ["transform-es2015-sticky-regex"] }

Via CLI

sh babel --plugins transform-es2015-sticky-regex script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["transform-es2015-sticky-regex"] });
